about_the_game: In a world of magic and malice, two souls find solace in a forbidden romance. The kingdom of Aradon has long suffered beneath the shadow of dark sorcery. Salvation requires an alliance, sealed by Princess Aurora’s marriage to a cruel prince. Yet Aurora’s heart belongs to another — a once-proud knight named Adrian, now cursed into a monstrous form. Beneath his terrifying appearance lies a heart of gold. Can Aurora break free from the chains of duty? Can Adrian lift the curse and reclaim his true self? And will their love be strong enough to defeat the vengeful witch Selena, whose thirst for revenge threatens to destroy them all?
